import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useAppContext } from "../libs/contextLib"; async function handleSubmitLogin(userHasAuthenticated) { e.preventDefault(); const usr = { userName: document.getElementById('userName').value, password: document.getElementById('password').value } const {data:aut} = await axios.post('http://localhost/login',usr); if (aut === 'True'){ userHasAuthenticated(true); } } const Login =() => { const { userHasAuthenticated } = useAppContext(); return (
Log in
Forgot Your Password? Sign Up
); } export default Login;
